shortContent: A metal object weighing 1 kilogram per the character's WP bonus within 20m flies to the character's hand when spending a Full Action and a successful WP bonus
content:
The character can cause an unsecured metal object within his
field of vision to fly into his hand. The object may weigh up
to 1 kilogram per point of the character’s Willpower Bonus,
and must lie within 20 metres. Using this Talent requires a
Full Action and a successful a Willpower Test.
